WorkItem.ClosedComment: Enchant added in a previous version.
WorkItem.Description:
I know this is not a terribly useful enchant, but perhaps it should be included for the sake of completeness. The item ID for the consumable item is 34207 and the spell ID for the actual enchant is 44769.
Â 
Glove Reinforcements
Requires Level 60 
Use: Permanently increase the armor on a pair of gloves by 240.  Only useable on items level 60 and above.

Comments.Message: Added for b11. And yeah, it's a crappy enchant for us; less than a third the value of 15agi for me, probably similar for most bears.
